title: Burial Ground (Le notti del terrore) - Andrea Bianchi 1980
description:
Le notti del terrore (Burial Ground) - Andrea Bianchi 1980 (Italy)
AKA: Night Of Terror || Zombie Horror || Le Notti Del Terrore || Burial Ground: The Nights Of Terror || Zombie 3
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0081248/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0081248/</a>

Easily one of my favourite Zombie movies. Surreal, gory and slow (in a good way), with amazing music. Eerie, cold and haunting analogue synthesizers. So damn good. 

The nights of terror are unleashed when a professor&#039;s thirst for knowledge seals his own demise as he unwittingly unseals a cursed underground crypt in an ancient burial ground!

The desecrated graveyard erupts with a ground swell of ravenous, rotting, flesh-hungry zombies that shamble into the night in search of living human prey! On the adjoining grounds, a group of clueless, decadent socialites are enjoying a wild weekend retreat of debauchery. Among the eccentric guests are a nympho mother and her freakish, incestuous son, played by Peter Parker (Pietro Barcella)

Encoded with DVD-Shrink. Untouched.

Picture: 1.85:1 Anamorphic WS

Sound: DD2.0

Subtitles: None

Format: NTSC

Extras:

# Still and poster gallery
# Trailers
# Talent Bios
# Exclusive interviews
